Detailed Description

CUDA device function.

Noncopyable.

void cuda::Function::useTexture ( const TextureReference &  texref  )  const

Use a texture.

makes the CUDA array or linear memory bound to the given texture reference available to a device program as a texture.

Parameters:
texref the texture reference
